attributes.action: Bring back wearing pe kits to school
attributes.additional_details: not everyone, including me and all of my class mates, are very uncomfortable getting changed in schools again and think it would be better to go into school in our pe kits for the entire day again
attributes.background: every pupil in the uk was fine wearing their pe kit to school last year and we were comfortable

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/580768
